page.title: 08HORSES
page.content: THE BOUDARY LINE BETWEEN THE QUORN AND COTTESMORE HUNTS COUNTRY CROSSES OUR BLOCK AND MANY LOCAL PEOPLE HUNT AND KEEP THEIR OWN HORSES AND PONIES. THERE ARE 2 LIVERY STABLES IN THORPE SATCHVILLE AND ALSO A THRIVING FORGE BELONGING TO THE FARRIER, MR D. GULLEY. CUB HUNTING BEGINS AT THE END OF AUGUST & THE HUNTINH SEASON STARTS IN OCTOBER CONTINUING UNTIL THE SPRING. THE FOX HUNT ATTRACTS MANY VISITORS TO THE AREA AND HRH THE PRINCE OF WALES OFTEN HUNTS WITH ONE OR OTHER OF THE HUNTS. MOST CHILDREN AND YOUNGF PEOPLE WITH THEIR OWN PONIES ARE MEMBERS OF THE LOCAL PONY CLUB BRANCH. DURING THE YEAR THEY ATTEND MOUNTED AND DISMOUNTED RALLIES, LEARNING HORSEMANSHIP.IN SUMMER A WEEK LONG CAMP IS HELD. COTTESMORE SENIOR GIRLS ARE NATIONAL FEDERATION CHAMPIONS.
